Reviews.Title: Great computer, workhorse-only one issue
Reviews.Author: Prissy Patriot "Prissy Patriot"
Reviews.Content: I bought this because I needed it for work and my Toshiba i.5 kept getting too hot,even with my cooling pad.  This cools great, but I have ONE problem...all the pop ups it was programmed with! MSI, why? I paid twice as much for a computer that has pop ups included! Not acceptable.  I downloaded my Office programs and Sophos, that I can buy through my college.But the pop ups are why I give this computer a 4 instead of 5 stars.  This needs to change. I have pop ups configured on Mozilla, so its not that.  It was obviously something MSI "included". No thanks, didn't think I was buying that in the package. Get rid of it MSI, its not appreciated, but I will figure out how to get rid of those.  Not that I should have to...
